case: Enter the name of a product that can be found in the store.
name: atid black shoes
expected Result: The site will show us all the products with the same name.

case: Enter the name of a product that can't be found in the store.
name: koook
expected Result: The website will display that the product is not available in the store.

case: We will enter a name prefix that is found in several products
name: Green
expected Result: Will display those products that have the same name prefix entered

case: We will enter the ending of a name that is found in several products
name: Shoes
expected Result: Will display those products that have the same name subfix entered

case: We will enter an empty name

name: D
expected Result: The site will display all products that have the same letter in their name.

case: We will enter a word that is found in the description of the same product.
name: Nam
expected Result: The site will display those products that have the same word in both the name and the product description.
